content.raw:
With the `find_package` change (this PR), I get this error:

`/media/louise/TERA/code/ign-fuel-tools/src/JSONParser.cc:22:23: fatal error: json/json.h: No such file or directory`

Reverting just the `find_package` but leaving the `jsoncpp_FOUND` fixes it:

~~~
diff -r 290f686e19ce cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Mon Sep 11 23:29:02 2017 +0200
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Tue Sep 26 11:08:12 2017 -0700
@@ -30,7 +30,8 @@
 
 ########################################
 # Find jsoncpp
-find_package(jsoncpp REQUIRED)
+ find_package(PkgConfig REQUIRED)
+ pkg_check_modules(jsoncpp jsoncpp)
 if (NOT jsoncpp_FOUND)
   BUILD_ERROR ("Missing: libjsoncpp-dev. Required for parsing json data.")
 endif()
~~~
content.html:
With the find_package change (this PR), I get this error:

/media/louise/TERA/code/ign-fuel-tools/src/JSONParser.cc:22:23: fatal error: json/json.h: No such file or directory

Reverting just the find_package but leaving the jsoncpp_FOUND fixes it:

diff -r 290f686e19ce cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake    Mon Sep 11 23:29:02 2017 +0200
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake    Tue Sep 26 11:08:12 2017 -0700
@@ -30,7 +30,8 @@

 ########################################
 # Find jsoncpp
-find_package(jsoncpp REQUIRED)
+ find_package(PkgConfig REQUIRED)
+ pkg_check_modules(jsoncpp jsoncpp)
 if (NOT jsoncpp_FOUND)
   BUILD_ERROR ("Missing: libjsoncpp-dev. Required for parsing json data.")
 endif()
